abstract: MasterCard agreed to buy British payment service provider DataCash Group for about 333 million pounds ($520 million) in cash to expand its e-commerce business.
snippet: MasterCard agreed to buy British payment service provider DataCash Group for about 333 million pounds ($520 million) in cash to expand its e-commerce business.
lead_paragraph: MasterCard agreed to buy the British payment service provider DataCash Group for about 333 million pounds ($520 million) in cash to expand its e-commerce business, sending DataCash shares to a 10-year high, Reuters reported.

headline.main: MasterCard to Buy DataCash for $520 Million
